error.birth-date-empty: Please enter a valid date of birth.
error.last-name-invalid: Please make sure your last name is between 5 and 50 characters.
error.first-name-invalid: Please make sure your first name is between 5 and 50 characters.
error.email-exist: The entered email is already registered. Please enter another email.
error.terms-and-conditions-empty: Please accept the terms and conditions.
error.password-web-invalid-length: Password must be longer than 5 characters and shorter than 30 characters.

register.title-server-message: All the information you share with us on Wow Libre is like the special ingredient for your amazing experience! The more we know, the better we can make your experience truly extraordinary. So, share those details with us and get ready for something out of this world!

kown-you.title-server-message: Your real name may be used in the future to verify your identity when you contact WowLibre. By default, your real name will remain hidden from other users.

contact-means.title-server-message: This is what you will use when logging into websites and mobile apps.

terms-and-conditions.title-server-message: Welcome to Wow Libre! Accepting our options allows you to immerse yourself in a personalized experience full of exclusive offers, exciting news, and much more.

input.email-check-text: The account email will receive special offers, news, and more from Wow Libre
input.term-check-text: I have read and accept the following: Terms and Conditions

account-web.title-server-message: Protect your account and choose a secure password for the administrative web.

error.empty-field-message: Please fill out all required fields to continue
error.authentication-message: The data is invalid, please check your information
